string.value: Thanks to #t4031737#, #t4161032# can now be read the way it was meant to be... The hidden message... pertains the #bhistory behind the creation of #m261000000##k. #p2020005# told me to visit him after finding out all the truth behind the note...
#m261000000#... With the secrets behind the town of alchemy about to be unveiled, I needed to see someone that is aware of its history... which means only one person. Alcaster.
Here, the note is fully deciphered, and all hidden texts are now visible. Let's see what's in this note... wait, this is... it's about #m261000000#... do you even know who wrote this note?

I see, so you do... #m261000000#... This note is about the #bstory behind the creation of #m261000000##k... the truth that has never been made public, until now. I wonder how you managed to get a hold of this note...

Alas, no secret will stay hidden forever. The fact that you have this note means that you are the most qualified to handle this. I am sure the heads of the two societies will not be pleased with this, but... here you go, please take this note.
Once you find out the whole truth on this matter, please come back and see me.
If you are too afraid to face the truth, then I suppose that's alright.
...you're here. Did you read the note from top to bottom?
